thread.title: Pope 'asks for forgiveness' from abuse victims

title: Pope 'asks for forgiveness' from abuse victims
text:
Pope 'asks for forgiveness' from abuse victims Wednesday, May 02, 2018 - 01:56
Chilean victims of clerical sexual abuse said on Wednesday that they had complained to Pope Francis about a “pathological and unlimited exercise of power” within the Church that had facilitated the cover-up of a sex scandal. Reuters Philip Pullella reports from Rome. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Chilean victims of clerical sexual abuse said on Wednesday that they had complained to Pope Francis about a “pathological and unlimited exercise of power” within the Church that had facilitated the cover-up of a sex scandal.
